citations.narrative:
* This unregistered individual transported four giant bunnies, two Coati Maundies, one red kangaroo, five African Dormice
(Micro-Squirrels), a kune kune pig and a pair of love birds, all animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act, to an exotic
animal auction being held at the Columbus, Nebraska, Fair Grounds on 20-September-2025. These animals belonged to
an licensee licensed under the Animal Welfare Act.
For future transporting of animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act a registration must be obtained. This can be
obtained by contacting the Regional Office at: (970) 494-7478, or email to: animalcare@usda.gov.
To be Correct by, 26-September-2025, or for future transporting.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.25(a) 
   
Requirements and procedures. 
* This unregistered individual transported four giant bunnies, two Coati Maundies, one red kangaroo, five African Dormice 
(Micro-Squirrels), a kune kune pig and a pair of love birds, all animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act, to an exotic 
animal auction being held at the Columbus, Nebraska, Fair Grounds on 20-September-2025. These animals belonged to 
an licensee licensed under the Animal Welfare Act.  
 
For future transporting of animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act a registration must be obtained. This can be 
obtained by contacting the Regional Office at: (970) 494-7478, or email to: animalcare@usda.gov.  
 
To be Correct by, 26-September-2025, or for future transporting. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
